name: Lost with you
description:
Survive with her!

You've been through an unfortunate plane crash.
Luckily, you survived, but ended up being stranded on a deserted island.
But there is still hope. 'Cause you're not alone
Can you survive and escape from the deserted island with her?

Survival




You have to manage your health, stamina, hunger and thirst. When your health reaches 0, it's game over.

Choice




You will be given options during the conversation. One choice won't bring a big change, but your reputation will gradually change.

Mini game


Your survival skills will be tested. Several mini-games are prepared, and the more you become proficient, the better you will survive.
